Uses of Interface
org.svvrl.goal.cmd.Statement

  • Packages that use Statement 
    Package Description
    org.svvrl.goal.cmd  
    org.svvrl.goal.cmd.parser  

    • Uses of Statement in org.svvrl.goal.cmd

      Classes in org.svvrl.goal.cmd that implement Statement 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BlockStmt
      A block statement contains a sequence of statements.
      class  BreakStmt
      A break statement can break a for-loop or a while-loop.
      class  ContinueStmt
      A ContinueStmt can continue a for-loop or a while-loop.
      class  ExitStmt
      An exit statement quits the GOAL process.
      class  ForStmt
      A for-loop statement binds an element in a set of objects to a lvalue in one iteration and executes its body statement iteratively for every binding.
      class  HelpStmt
      A help statement displays the help message of a command or all commands.
      class  IfStmt
      An if-statement contains a set of guarded branches.
      class  InteractiveStmt
      An InteractiveStmt starts the interactive mode.
      class  MultiSetStmt
      A MultiSetStmt assigns values to variables simultaneously.
      class  SetStmt
      A SetStmt assigns a value to an l-value.
      class  TryStmt
      This class provides try statements:
      class  WhileStmt
      A WhileStmt represents a while-loop statement.
      Methods in org.svvrl.goal.cmd with parameters of type Statement 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void IfStmt.addBranch(Expression cond, Statement body)
      Inserts a guarded branch to this if-statement.
      void IfStmt.setElseBranch(Statement body)
      Sets the else-branch of this if-statement.
      Constructors in org.svvrl.goal.cmd with parameters of type Statement 
      Constructor and Description
      BlockStmt(Statement[] stmts)
      Constructs this block statement with sub-statements.
      ForStmt(Lval lv, Expression set, Statement body)
      Constructs this for-loop statement with a lvalue, a set of objects, and the loop body.
      WhileStmt(Expression cond, Statement body)
      Constructs this while-loop statement with the loop condition and the loop body.
